00017 bool LevelManager::LoadLevel(unsigned int id)
00018 {
00019         char file[20];
00020         sprintf_s(file, "data/level%d.xml", id);
00021         
00022         TiXmlDocument doc(NiApplication::ConvertMediaFilename(file));
00023         
00024         bool loadOkay = doc.LoadFile();
00025         if (loadOkay)
00026         {
00027                 TiXmlElement* root = doc.RootElement();
00028                 if (root)
00029                 {
00030                         const char* name = root->Attribute("name");
00031                         if (name)
00032                         {
00033                                 LevelPtr level = NiNew Level(name);
00034                                 if (ReadEnemies(root->FirstChildElement("enemies"), level))
00035                                 {
00036                                         m_lLevels.SetAt(id, level);
00037                                         return true;
00038                                 }
00039                         }
00040                 }
00041         }
00042         
00043         return false;
00044 
00045 }
00046 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 bool LevelManager::ReadFloat(float &value, TiXmlElement* node, const char* child)
00048 {
00049         TiXmlElement* current = node->FirstChildElement(child);
00050         if (current)
00051         {
00052                 value    = (float)atof(current->GetText());
00053         }
00054         else 
00055         {
00056                 return false;
00057         }
00058 
00059         return true;
00060 }
00061 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 bool LevelManager::ReadEnemies(TiXmlElement* node, LevelPtr level)
00063 {
00064         if (!node) return false;
00065         TiXmlElement* current = node->FirstChildElement();
00066         for (current = node->FirstChildElement(); current; current = current->NextSiblingElement())
00067         {
00068                 const char* enemyType = current->Attribute("type");
00069                 if (enemyType)
00070                 {
00071                         if (!strcmp(enemyType, "LOCUST"))
00072                         {
00073                                 LocustPtr enemy = NiNew Locust;
00074                                 float x, y, z;
00075                                 if (ReadFloat(x, current, "x") && 
00076                                         ReadFloat(y, current, "y") && 
00077                                         ReadFloat(z, current, "z"))
00078                                 {
00079                                         enemy->GetAgent()->GetActor()->setGlobalPosition(NxVec3(x, y, z));
00080                                 //      level->AddEnemy((GameCharacter*)enemy);
00081                                 }
00082                         }
00083                 }
00084         }
00085 
00086         return false;
00087 }
